text: The Western Counties Air Operations Unit was a joint consortium established to provide police aviation for Avon and Somerset Constabulary and Gloucestershire Constabulary. It was formed in August 1995, and operated a Eurocopter EC135 from Bristol Filton Airport. In July 2013 the unit was subsumed into the National Police Air Service, becoming NPAS Filton, though continued to operate from Filton. ==See also== * Police aviation * Police aviation in the United Kingdom ==References== ==External links== * Category:Police aviation units of the United Kingdom
title: Western Counties Air Operations Unit
